A propos l'AIDC
L'AIDC est une association mondiale de constitutionnalistes et de juristes faisant face aux défis sans précédent d'un nouvel ordre mondial.
Prochaines activités

Table ronde La mondialisation et constitutionnalisme au 21e siècle Séoul, 19-21 novembre 2009 Un programme sera disponible bientôt. . télécharger le programme ici site web VIIIe Congrès Mondial La question de principe Mexico, 6-10 décembre 2010 Un programme sera disponible bientôt. .télécharger le programme ici site web
Call for papers: Symposium on Religious Rights and Freedoms, Johannesburg 15-16 September 2011
By IACL secretariat, on April 6th, 2011

SAIFAC (a centre of the University of Johannesburg) together with the Faculty of Law, University of the Free State and Jutas are delighted to announce a call for papers for a Symposium on Religious Rights and Freedoms.
Full details are included in this document >>>
Abstracts must be submitted by 3 May 2011. The conference will be held between 15-16 September

Call for papers: African Network of Constitutional Lawyers | Appel à Contributions: Réseau Africain de Droit Constitutionnel
By IACL secretariat, on October 6th, 2010

The African Network of Constitutional Lawyers (ANCL) will hold its Annual Conference in Rabat, Morocco on 2-5 February 2011. The theme of the conference is 'The internationalisation of Constitutional Law'.

Call for Papers: Tracking Progress in the Protection of Socio-economic rights in Africa | Appel de soumissions: Suivi des progrès réalisés dans la protection des droits socio-économiques en Afrique
By IACL secretariat, on July 31st, 2010

The African Network of Constitutional Lawyers' (ANCL) Working Group on Social and Economic Rights in Africa (SERIA) will be hosting a one-day conference on Wednesday 8 September 2010 in Cape Town focussing on tracking progress in the protection of socio-economic rights in Africa. Call for papers — World Congress workshop 15 ‘The impact of international law on constitutional principles’ | Appel de communications — congrès mondial atelier 15 « L’impact du droit international sur les principes constitutionnels »
By IACL secretariat, on April 21st, 2010
Workshop 15

This workshop will examine the trend toward the increasing incorporation of rules and principles of international law into domestic constitutions. The trend is most pronounced in the field of human rights and international humanitarian law, though the workshop certainly welcomes studies in other areas of international law as well. We will construe the workshop

Call for papers — World Congress workshop 1 ‘Electoral systems and constitutional principles’ | Appel de communications — congrès mondial atelier 1 « Les systèmes électoraux et les principes constitutionnels »
By IACL secretariat, on April 11th, 2010
World Congress workshop 1
Electoral systems and constitutional principles

Elections are an essential element of a democratic system. But electoral systems are not neutral. They reflect and reinforce many of the principles and values that underlie the constitutional order. Sometimes the influence of the electoral system on the constitutional order is obvious and deliberate. Sometimes it is

Call for papers — World Congress workshop 10 ‘The indivisibility of human rights’ | Appel de communications — congrès mondial atelier 10 « L'indivisibilité des droits de l'homme »
By IACL secretariat, on April 11th, 2010
WORKSHOP 10
THE INDIVISIBILITY OF HUMAN RIGHTS

Constitutional scholars generally distinguish among three major categories of human rights – classical liberties (status negativus), political rights (status activus) and rights to state benefits (status positivus). However, the position of each of these categories in the national constitutions and in international documents is not identical. Accordingly, classical liberties and
April 11th, 2010 | Category: Appel de soumissions, Call for papers, Congrès mondial Mexico, Groupes de recherche, Mexico World Congress | Comments are closed
Appel de communications — congrès mondial atelier 5 « Les constitutions infranationales » | Call for papers — World Congress workshop 5 ‘Subnational constitutions’
By IACL secretariat, on April 11th, 2010
Workshop 5
Subnational Constitutions

Workshop 5 will provide a forum for the analytical and comparative study of existing and developing subnational constitutions and constitution-like documents in component units. Emerging questions include:
what counts as a “constitution”;
how such constitutions differ from federal constitutions and each other;
how federal constitutions define the space allocated for subnational constitutions (constitutional competency)
April 11th, 2010 | Category: Appel de soumissions, Call for papers, Congrès mondial Mexico, Mexico World Congress | Comments are closed
Appel de communications — congrès mondial atelier 13 « Droit contitutionnel latino-américain » | Call for papers — World Congress workshop 13 ‘Latin-American constitutional law’
By IACL secretariat, on March 29th, 2010
Atelier 13
Nouvelles tendances dans le droit constitutionnel latino-américain

L'Amérique latine a vu un fort développement des principes constitutionnels qui caractérisent les démocraties libérales. De nouvelles constitutions ont été décrétées et les courts suprêmes et constitutionnelles ont renforcé leur rôle comme gardiens de la constitution. La cour interaméricaine des droits de l'homme a accru son autorité
March 29th, 2010 | Category: Appel de soumissions, Call for papers, Congrès mondial Mexico, Mexico World Congress | Comments are closed

By IACL secretariat, on March 28th, 2010
World Congress workshop 6
The rule of law in the age of terrorism

Appel de communications — congrès mondial atelier 8 « Le fédéralisme’ » | Call for papers — World Congress workshop 8 ‘Federalism’
By IACL secretariat, on March 10th, 2010
Atelier 8
Es-ce que le fédéralisme est un principe constitutionnel?

Cet atelier est ouvert à tout article traitant d'une large série de questions à propos du fédéralisme et des systèmes fédéraux, centré sur, ou relié d'une certaine manière à, la question générale du principe constitutionnel. Parmi des exemples de questions figurent les suivantes :
